description.english: You will slay the Undying Champion.
You will find Tizian the Lost Ranger.
You will kill 15 Plague Rats with fire damage.
You will kill Academy Headmaster while having Caustic Bomb skill.
You will deal 2000 physical attack damage while using a Bow.
You will kill 10 enemies in 60 seconds.
You will kill 33 enemies with lightning damage in a single run.
You will kill 12 enemies with Shield Bash skill.
You will slay 100 enemies with Fire or Physical damage while using a Two Handed Sword.
You will find Ruvius the Elementalist.
You will endure 250 fire damage.
You will deal 200 frost damage in 10 seconds.
Kill 50 enemies.
You will deal 1000 decay damage in a single run.
You will kill 25 enemies with decay damage in a single run.
You will kill 6 enemies in 20 seconds with lightning damage.
You will slay Undying Champion 3 times.
You will discard 50 items.
You will level up 50 times.
You will kill 45 scholars.
Level up 2 skills to level 5 in a single run.
You will have 4 skills from the same skill category.
You will buy 10 items.
You will buy 10 skills in a shop.
You will remove 3 skills in a single run
You will kill 40 enemies while using a One Handed Sword.
You will kill 80 enemies with Swirling Carnage skill.
You will slay 66 husks while using a Two Handed Sword.
You will kill 50 enemies with the Execute skill.
You will travel 10000 meters.
You will slay the Rat King.
You will slay Rat King 4 times.
You will kill 3 enemies in 5 seconds while using Bow. You will do this 3 times.
You will slay the Academy Headmaster.
You will slay the Headmaster 4 times.
You will kill 4 Justiciars.
Have total of 80 Armor and 40 Frost Resistance.
You will kill 25 chilled enemies with lightning damage while having Tornado skill.
You will reflect 300 frost or physical damage in a single run.
You will deal 1000 fire damage in a single run.
You will help Ipius the Archivist.
You will find 5 Stray Stars.
You will enter the College of Sanctora.
You will kill 21 Inquisitors, Justiciars or Overseers.
You will kill 21 Scholars, Adepts or Elders while they're burning.
You will kill 5 Alpha Rats in a single run.
You will destroy 5 Rats Nests in a single run.
You will kill Rat King while having Execute skill.
You will endure 300 damage in a single run.
You will find the book of the Forbidden Incantations.
You will confront Matron Amara with your findings as Aelar Thorne.
You will kill 25 poisoned enemies with Magic damage.
You will help Aelar Thorne the Warlock.
Deal 2500 fire damage over time to blinded enemies.
Kill 30 enemies in succession without taking damage.
You will kill a Great Enemy while bleeding.
You will equip 50 different items in a single run.
You will arrive at the end of your journey.
You will win 3 consecutive runs.
You will activate a well of stars in a darkened place.
You will acquire the Gauged Eye of the Beast.
Cause 50 enemies to burn within 30 seconds.
Open 10 chests in 75 seconds.
You will slay the Blade of Light.
Apply and sustain the Weak status on an enemy for 30 seconds.
Get played by Mahler.
You will kill a Great Enemy while having 4 abyssal detriments.
You will spend 1000 gold in a single run as Archivist.
You will slay an enemy in one hit 15 times, while using a Two Handed Mace.
You will kill 40 bleeding enemies with Retribution skill in a single run.
You will reflect 1200 damage while blocking as Slave Warrior in a single run.
You will reach Darkness Level 7.
You will deal 2000 lightning damage within 15 seconds as Elementalist.
Apply and sustain the Burning status on an enemy for 12 seconds as Elementalist.
You will kill 15 frozen enemies as Elementalist in a single run.
You will inflict bleeding 100 times as Wildheart.
You will use 3 Guillotines in the same run.
You will find a Shiny Skull and give it to the cub.
You will kill 15 marked enemies as Lost Ranger in a single run.
Have total of +40% Magic Damage and +40% Skill Damage as Astromancer.
You will slay Plagued Rat Horror with a One-Handed axe, while it's chilled or frozen.
You will deal 20000 damage over time as Warlock in a single run.
You will slay Matron Amara.
You will deal 1000 Thorns damage in a single run.
You will become frozen, burning, poisoned, shocked and exposed in a single run.
You will apply shock 1000 times in a single run.
You will destroy the monument of Three Swords.
Sustain 20 or more barrier for 100 seconds.
Have a total of 60% Attack Speed and 30 bonus Magic Attack damage.
Hit enemies 80 times with magic damage within 6 seconds.
Deal 1000 magic damage in a single hit.
You will dodge 30 attacks from blinded enemies in a single run.
